author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
While many justifications tiptoe around ambiguous feelings in fear of misgendering suspects, the same cannot be said for Sheriff Grady Judd. And while he is out there fighting to uphold the law, he also does a great job of reporting to the media, most humorously.

Judd whipped out a photo during a Friday press conference of a suspect, who is undeniably “one ugly woman.”

SHERIFF GRADY JUDD: "This guy's an ugly woman. This is what you really get when the makeup comes off."

"I want you to think about this for a minute. You decide you want to hook up with a woman. She comes in, she's already uglier than a mud fence. Right? And then, as you start to… pic.twitter.com/e6dRFABfOA
— Florida’s Voice (@FLVoiceNews)
title: Greatest sheriff in America calls out male prostitute for being "one ugly woman"
